tldr: This biographical memoir of Harold Macmillan, the first Earl of Stockton, highlights his life, military service, and political career. Macmillan was a skilled politician and served as a prime minister known for his "Middle Way" political philosophy, balancing private enterprise and collectivism. His life was marked by his military service in World War I, his political career, and his contributions to British society.
